description: Try our easy to follow Kickin' Beans With Crispy Tortillas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tortilla,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Kickin' Beans With Crispy Tortillas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cut tortillas into long triangles. Arrange on prepared tray in a single layer. Spray with oil. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden and crisp.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook onion and capsicum, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add beans, paprika and chilli flakes. Stir for 1 minute or until coated and fragrant.
Add tomato paste, sauce and 3/4 cup water and bring to the boil. Simmer for 8-10 minutes or until sauce thickens and beans are warmed through.
Serve beans with spring onion, cheese, sour cream (sprinkled with paprika), tortillas and lime wedges.
